name: Chick 'n Dibs
description:
Cock-a-doodle-doo!

Chick 'n Dibs is an arcade, endless runner, and a side-scrolling 2d animated game that is heavily inspired by cartoon animation style of the 1930s.

Ken the chicken once lived in a restaurant that eventually will have his life be served on a plate. Once upon a time, he had escaped his tasty doom and is now determined to take revenge by collecting all coins he can find so that no one can ever again lay hands on chicken foods, and for his remaining flock of friends to eventually be set free!

  •  Collect and carry coins that pop on the screen while dodging enemies that will either try to kill you or take their coins back! 
  •  Be on the lookout for the hungry pip on the left corner, he'll remind you when you're about to be cooked. Yumm!
  •  Use your collection to buy and learn new skills to help you along the way and be the best chicken ever!

B-b-b-bokawk!

Game Features:

  • Easy to play! (Just tap and you are ready to go)
  • Hand-drawn art and sound effects reminiscent of the old cartoons!
  • Slow to fast paced thrilling and fun experience, real quick!
  • 8 unlockable skills to use in-game!
  • Up to 15 secret characters/enemies with varying ways to disrupt you!
  • Coin-loot drops upon death to help you get back up from defeat.
  • Hidden score-rewards as you play continuously.
  • Increasing difficulty as you play and collect more coins.
  • Randomly generated and hard to read enemy attacks!
  • Difficult to master! (Not for the faint of heart)

PS. The game will make you feel frustrated -- hopefully to keep you playing.
